titles.title: Sing Praise to God Who Reigns Above

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sing praise to God who reigns above, the God of all creation; the God of pow'r, the God of love, the God of our salvation; with healing balm my soul He fills, and ev'ry faithless murmur stills - to God all praise and glory!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: What God's almighty pow'r has made in mercy He is keeping, by morning glow or evening shade His eye is never sleeping; within the kingdom of His might, lo! all is just and all is right - to God all praise and glory!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The Lord is never far away, but through all grief distressing, an ever-present help and stay, our peace and joy and blessing; as with a mother's tender hand He leads His own, His chosen band - to God all praise and glory!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thus all my toilsome way along, I sing aloud His praises, that all may hear the grateful song my voice unwearied raises: "Be joyful in the Lord, my heart! Both soul and body bear your part - to God all praise and glory!
